english.segment1: Whatever is noble. Whatever is true. So compelling. Perfect to you
english.segment2: Whatever you heard or learnt or receive. It's time to practise what you believe
english.segment3: Think, just think about it. Let it totally fill your mind. Look ahead and not behind
english.segment4: Whatever is generous. Whatever is sound. Or just and good and honourable. Or beauty bound
english.segment5: Honest and real. Pure that you feel
